name: Human Potential, Mass
target: one creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
text: This spell functions like human potential, except it affects multiple creatures. Each target can choose a different ability score to be enhanced by this spell.
target_zh: 一个生物/等级，彼此相距不得超过30尺
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 这种法术类似于人性潜力，除了可以影响多个生物。每个目标可以选择不同的属性来强化。
